reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: CT 1997 North Africa RLA-Morocco (CTF) DOJ/OPDAT. CT 1997 North Africa RLA in Morocco (CTF)

description.narrative: This award strives to help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability. More specifically, this includes CT 1997 OPDAT North Africa RLA based in Morocco CN 16-216 1931AN16Y0002-160013 [Covers services supplied by other U.S. Government agencies not otherwise classified.]. Award Description - CT 1997 OPDAT North Africa RLA based in Morocco CN 16-216 1931AN16Y0002-160013.

To help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability; and for responding effectively against arising threats to national or international security and stability.
